game.name: Pseudo World
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Roll your own story in Pseudo World, a third-person, endless-world ARPG with procedurally generated quests. Recruit any NPC into your party, for better or worse, and be the "hero" that Lan Redic needs!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Roll your own story in Pseudo World, a third-person, endless-world ARPG with procedurally generated quests. Recruit any NPC into your party, for better or worse, and be the "hero" that Lan Redic needs!
